ComicInfo.Title: Stave 3: The Second of the Three Spirits
ComicInfo.Summary:
Deadpool carves his way through the annals of literature! Scrooge gets a visit from THREE BULLETS! Gulliver gets a SWIFT DEATH! Throw away your library card and BUY THIS BOOK!
*Notes:* The cover is a homage of the cover of the series Classics Illustrated.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:08:05. [CVDB395246]
ComicInfo.Characters: Bagheera, Baloo, Beowulf, Captain Ahab, Captain Nemo, Charybdis, Deadpool, Death, Dr. Moreau, Dr. Watson, Ebenezer Scrooge, Frankenstein, Kaa, Mowgli, Mulan, Natty Bumppo, Scylla, Shere Khan, Sherlock Holmes, The Little Mermaid, Victor Frankenstein
ComicInfo.Locations: India, Italy, Lilliput, Rome, The Caribbean
